title: Add Styles to HTML Element
description: In this lab, we will explore how to add styles to an HTML element using JavaScript. By using the `addStyles()` function provided, we can easily merge a set of CSS styles into the style of a given HTML element. This lab will provide a hands-on experience of adding styles to an HTML element dynamically, enhancing the visual appearance of a web page.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
